title: Mother-Daughter Special
contents:
Time to spoil your mother to a relaxing afternoon in the comfort of her room!

Book your upcoming getaway or staycation along with two blowouts; enjoy 50% savings on your mum’s one.

Before heading out stop by our lobby bar, The Den, for a complimentary cocktail!

The ideal mother-daughter getaway!

 

Must be booked 7-days in advance
